name: EKS Framework
description: A Terraform-based framework for deploying microservices on Amazon EKS with Fargate. Includes automated CI pipelines, Helm-based add-ons, and a preconfigured Grafana stack for monitoring and observability.

name: Secure Cloud Baseline
description: A production-ready AWS secure baseline built with Terraform. Logging, IAM, GuardDuty, and optional VPC; deployable in under an hour. Built for startups that can't afford to get security wrong.
